Sample_treatment_protocol_ch1: Before experiment, the MCF7 cells were hormone-stripped in phenol red-free DMEM medium plus 5% charcoal-treated FBS for 3 days, followed by treatemnt of either 100 nM 17β-estrodial (E2) or ethanol as vehcile control for 1hr.
Sample_growth_protocol_ch1: MCF7 obtained from ATCC were cultured in DMEM media supplemented with 10% FBS in a 5% CO2 humidified incubator at 37°C.
Sample_extract_protocol_ch1: 20,000 cells were harvested for each condition. After purification of nuclei, transposition was performed with Tn5 transposase from Nextera DNA Library Prep Kit (Illumina, catalog # FC-121-1030). ATAC-seq library prep was performed as in Buenrostro et al, 2015.
Sample_data_processing: Basecalls performed using Illuminal CASAVA software., The adaptor was removed by using cutadapt v1.11 with parameters "-m 20 -e 0.1". The clean reads were aligned to the hg19 genome assembly using bowtie2 v2.2.9 with parameters "-mm --very-sensitive --no-discordant -X 2000", and only primary alignments were retained. The alignments were shifted with +4 for plus strand and -5 for minus strand.
Sample_contact_institute: Universality of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio
